name: Glory Borne
description:
This is a roguelike action rpg inspired by Pixel Dungeon, Brogue, and Binding Of Isaac. In relatively early  development and currently a few bugs here and there but updates are frequent! The game features an advanced level generation system involving volume sorted Delaunay triangulation and a whole lot of clean up iterations!

"ESC" Closes the game completely and instantly!

AWSD - Movement controls, point n' click to use weapon, and press "E" to open inventory. Just click the bottom right "play" button to start the game.
